item.title: The Twilight Saga Theatrical Rerelease Dates Revealed by Lionsgate
item.description: The Kristen Stewart, Robert Pattinson and Taylor Lautner-led franchise first hit theaters in 2008 with ‘Twilight,’ directed by Catherine Hardwicke.

item.title: The Twilight Saga to Return to Theaters in October
item.description: The hit franchise released five films starring Kristen Stewart, Robert Pattinson and Taylor Lautner from 2008 to 2012.
